    STAT225 Introduction to Probability Models

    Course Info

    • When: M, W, F : 1:30 pm to 2:20 pm, 2:30 pm to 3:20 pm
    • Where: UNIV 017
    • Course Instructuor: Qi Wang
    • Email: qiwang@purdue.edu
    • Office: MATH 541
    • Office Hour: Hass Help Room or by appointment
    • Textbook: Introduction to Probability by Mark Daniel Ward and Ellen Gundlach, 1st edition, W.H. Freeman
    • Course Coordinator: Ce-Ce Furtner
    • Course Website: STAT225
      • username: stat225
      • psw: fall2018
